meta.job_title: Assistant General Manager / Director of Rooms

duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee operation of the Front Office, Housekeeping, Laundry, Concierge, PBX and Bell Staff/Shuttle.
Work closely with the AGM or General Manager on special projects and assignments.
Responsible for the management, evaluation, and performance of all teams.
Maximize guest service scores and opportunities within the division.
Assist the resort general manager in overseeing and coordination of the planning, organizing, training, and leadership.
Manage both the revenue and (P&L) Profit & Loss of the resort.
Provide overall leadership, guidance, and direction to the resort management team.
Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal rules, regulations, human resources, safety, and sanitation/health requirements within the resort.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management, Business Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
